articles.description: CSK thrashes SRH by 7 wickets to register their 5th consecutive victory in IPL 2021, goes top of IPL points table, Du Plessis has orange cap
articles.content: CSK thrash SRH by 7 wickets to register their 5th consecutive victory in IPL 2021, goes on top of IPL points table: CSK openers Faf Du Plessis & Ruturaj Gaikwad registered century partnership as … [+4347 chars]

articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: IPL 2021: Australian Players Nervous Whether They Can Get Back To Australia, Says David Hussey - NDTV Sports
articles.description: IPL 2021: Kolkata Knight Riders mentor David Hussey said Australian players at the IPL are "a bit nervous about whether they can get back into Australia" even as three Australians pulled out citing personal reasons.
articles.content: Kolkata Knight Riders mentor David Hussey has said that some of the fellow Australians in the IPL are a "bit nervous" about getting back home in the wake of a COVID-19 surge in India. While Rajasthan… [+1867 chars]
